public ref class DispatcherSynchronizationContext sealed : System::Threading::SynchronizationContext

Docs.summary: Provides a synchronization context for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not specified at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> instance, the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.

Docs.param: The object passed to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context asynchronously.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
